one.block.eosiojava.models.signatureProvider

Class EosioTransactionSignatureRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • one.block.eosiojava.models.signatureProvider.EosioTransactionSignatureRequest

  • public class EosioTransactionSignatureRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    The request object that will be sent to SignatureProvider. It contains the transaction that will need to be signed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Instantiates a new Eosio transaction signature request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EosioTransactionSignatureRequest

        public EosioTransactionSignatureRequest(java.lang.String serializedTransaction,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> signingPublicKeys,
                                        java.lang.String chainId,
                                        java.util.List<BinaryAbi> abis,
                                        boolean isModifiable)
        Instantiates a new Eosio transaction signature request.
        Parameters:
        serializedTransaction - the serialized transaction
        signingPublicKeys - the signing public keys
        chainId - the chain id
        abis - the ABIs
        isModifiable - boolean to indicate whether the signature provider is able to modify the transaction

      • getSerializedTransaction

        public java.lang.String getSerializedTransaction()
        Gets the serialized transaction.
        The serialized (Hex) version of Transaction.
        It is the result of ISerializationProvider.serializeTransaction(String)
        Returns:
        the serialized transaction

      • getSigningPublicKeys

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSigningPublicKeys()
        Gets the signing public key.
        The EOSIO public key that will be used to find the private keys (or key identities) to sign the serialized transaction.
        Returns:
        the signing public key

        Parameters:

      • setAbis

      • isModifiable

        public boolean isModifiable()
        isModifiable boolean.
        If the signature provider modifies the serialized transaction and returns it in the response EosioTransactionSignatureResponse.getSerializeTransaction() but this field is false then TransactionGetSignatureNotAllowModifyTransactionError will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the boolean

      • setModifiable

        public void setModifiable(boolean modifiable)
        Sets isModifiable.
        If the signature provider modifies the serialized transaction and returns it in the response EosioTransactionSignatureResponse.getSerializeTransaction() but this field is false then TransactionGetSignatureNotAllowModifyTransactionError will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        modifiable - the modifiable
